sentence.Network_en: Why the outgoing President's felicitation on the indorsement?
sentence.Network_cn: 爲什麽卸任总统要对人民的支持巧言美语?

sentence.Network_en: Sincere felicitation on your completing the postgraduate course and receiving the doctorate of science.
sentence.Network_cn: 衷心祝贺你修完研究生课程并获得理学博士学位.

PerfectNetExp.abs: felicitate 祝贺felicitation 庆祝felicitator 祝贺者
felicitate 祝贺，庆祝felicitation 庆祝，庆贺felicitous （措辞等）恰当的，贴切的

list.abs: Felgea 费尔吉亚牌手表felicitous plant 灵芝草Felidie 飞丽迪亚牌手表
I felicitate myself on my narrow escape ., 我庆幸自己死里逃生.
he felicitated himself that he had passed the entry examination .他庆幸自己通过了入学考试。
say exactly 准确地表明say felicitously 贴切地表明say flatly 断言

means.word_mean: 1. (usually plural) an expression of pleasure at the success or good fortune of another;

sentences.sentence: "I sent them my sincere congratulations on their marriage"

means.word_mean: 2. the act of acknowledging that someone has an occasion for celebration
